## Welcome to LASER

We are a research group in the Department of Chemical Engineering at Sunchon National University, focusing on **Process Systems Engineering (PSE)** with applications in carbon capture, clean energy, and sustainable chemical processes.

---

::: {.grid}

::: {.g-col-md-4}
::: {.laser-card}
### Research Focus

- **Carbon Capture & Utilization**: CO₂ reduction and conversion technologies
- **Clean Energy**: Hydrogen production, oxy-combustion systems
- **Process Optimization**: Advanced experimental design and optimization
- **Machine Learning**: Data-driven process modeling and control
